items.sentence: I don\'t think Tom knows how to play this game.
I don\'t think Tom knows where his umbrella is.
Tom wants somebody to help him paint his house.
Tom and Mary didn\'t enjoy walking in the rain.
Tom was leaning against the wall near the door.
Tickets are $30 in advance and $35 at the door.
Tom didn\'t do what he said he was going to do.
Tom has put on a bit of weight since last year.
I think that accident could\'ve been prevented.
That\'s something I don\'t know anything about.
